document.full_text: an american officer's conversation with an afghan woman who, after spending years in the united states, has returned to her native land to work as an interpreter for the american military forces.
document.title: at war: coming home, as an interpreter
lines_and_colors: an american officer's conversation with an afghan woman who, after spending years in the united states, has returned to her native land to work as an interpreter for the american military forces.
